hadiths.text: Narrated As-Salt bin 'Abdullah bin Nawfal: "Ibn Abbas wore a ring on his right hand. And I do not doubt he said: 'I saw the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) wearing a ring on his right hand.'" [Abu 'Eisa said:] Muhammad bin Isma'il said: "The Hadith is Muhammad bin Ishaq from As-Salt bin 'Abdullah bin Nawfal is a Hasan Sahih Hadith

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي لُبْسِ الْخَاتَمِ فِي الْيَمِينِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Wearing The Ring On The Right Hand
